title: Contributing to BioBlend as a developer
questions: How to get started making contributions to BioBlend?
objectives: Learn the basics behind BioBlend and the Galaxy API from a developer perspective.
Learn how to implement a simple method in BioBlend.
Learn how to run the BioBlend test suite.

requirements.title: Familiarity with git and access to a GitHub account
Familiarity with the Python programming language
Familiarity with HTTP methods and JavaScript Object Notation (JSON)

key_points: BioBlend is a Python library that provides methods for easy interaction with the Galaxy API.
Implementing BioBlend methods is generally quite an easy process, making it well suited to beginners and a viable stepping stone into Galaxy development.
